price: Waan Rabbiin kiyya naaf araarameefi kabajamtoota irraa na godhe (odoo beekaniin hawwa).”
arabic: بِمَا غَفَرَ لِي رَبِّي وَجَعَلَنِي مِنَ ٱلۡمُكۡرَمِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: bimā ghafara lī rabbī wajaʿalanī mina al-muk'ramīna
